Description: Primary key identifier for the economic survey definition
Reference to the parent survey definition
Data Quality Checks: NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to data_collect.survey_definition

Description: Title of the economic survey section
Detailed description of the economic survey section
Sample Values: This section collects data about family income

Description: Indicates if this economic survey section is currently active

Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future

Description: JSON schema defining the structure of the economic survey
JSON schema for UI rendering of the economic survey
Version identifier for the economic survey
Data Quality Checks: Semantic version format check, Unique per survey_id

Description: Indicates if this is a template economic survey that can be reused
Reference to the organization that owns this economic survey
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations

Description: Reference to the application (hub) this economic survey belongs to
Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.applications

Description: User who last modified the record
Timestamp when the record was created

Data Quality Checks: Valid timestamp, Not in future, >= created_date
